title: Attacking Taiwan? Social Stabilization? Xi orders massive mandatory military recruitment.
description:
#chinainsights #taiwan #lightning-fastwar
China has suddenly seen a massive and mandatory military recruitment. 
Is the CCP's current strategy towards Taiwan a hot war or a war of perception? Is it a lightning-fast war or a protracted one? This is one of the most controversial issues concerning China in 2024. 
According to a recent study by a British think tank, China has raised its defense budget for 29 consecutive years in preparation for a protracted war in the Indo-Pacific region.
#chinainsights
